dc_title_s: Americae sive novi orbis, nova descriptio.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. On verso: Text and plate number "2." Appeared as pl. 2 in his Theatrum orbis terrarum. Antwerp, 1570. Decorative cartouche. 1 map: hand col.; 35 x 48 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
